page.title: 14MY HOUSE AT RADLEY GREEN
page.content: The house I live in was once part of a terrace of farm workers' cottages.We live in accommodation built for 2 fam- ilies.When my parents bought the houses 8 years ago they had been empty for 2 years.The Council had said they were not fit for occupation.They were in a terrible state.My Dad is a sur- veyor so he knew what had to be done. Inside there was just one tap for cold water.A hole in the wall was the drain The toilet was a bucket in the garden shed.The floors were rotten.The out- side walls had to be re-rendered,the inside walls replastered,some walls were knocked down,hot and cold water, bathroom and toilets put in.The garden was dug up to put in a septic tank and drains.While this work was done we lived in an old caravan.I was 6 months old then.Work was finally finished 2 years later when my brother was born.
